name: Climb Craft 2: Maze Escape FREE
description:
Welcome to the most dangerous maze in the world!

You were invited here to be a part of a really dangerous challenge –enter, explore and find an exit out of some strange deserted labyrinth. You'll find here a lot of trials and traps. Overcome all the difficulties and find your reward - find the exit! Climb Craft 2: Maze Escape FREE – check your courage, test your wits and be the only one who got out of this strange place!

Can you escape the maze? Explore the labyrinth, jump over abysses, work out your personal plan and deal with all the dangerous traps! For the best understanding you can try tutorial first.

Climb Craft 2: Maze Escape FREE game features:
• Real and dangerous labyrinth;
• Different trials, traps and obstacles;
• Amazing graphics;
• Lots of levels

Do you feel strong and smart enough to step into this horror maze? Anyway, Climb Craft 2: Maze Escape FREE is ready to take you in. Let's start the challenge!
